mule.xsi:schemaLocation: http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/core http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/core/current/mule.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/http http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/http/current/mule-http.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mule-apikit http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/mule-apikit/current/mule-apikit.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/core http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/ee/core/current/mule-ee.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/db/current/mule-db.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/json http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/json/current/mule-json.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/os http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/os/current/mule-os.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/java http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/java/current/mule-java.xsd http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/wsc http://www.mulesoft.org/schema/mule/wsc/current/mule-wsc.xsd

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- { ipAddress: attributes.queryParams.ipAddress, port: attributes.queryParams.port }

logger.doc:name: INFO: Success
logger.message: Ping IP Addess flow completed successfully

logger.doc:name: INFO: Failure
logger.message: Ping IP Addess flow completed unsuccessfully

logger.doc:name: INFO: Failure
logger.message: Ping IP Addess flow completed unsuccessfully

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { methodName: 'CreateCheck', storeId: if(vars.storeId != null) vars.storeId else vars.vrStoreId, checkNumber: 'Null', checkSequence: 'Null', employeeNumber: 'Null', tableNumber: 'Null', status: '1', message: vars.initialPayload }]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json --- ((vars.vrDetails filter ( ($.store_id as String == vars.storeId as String) and ($.delivery_partner_name as String== vars.deliveryPartner as String) and ($.brand_id as String == vars.brandId as String) )).vr_store_id)[0] default "NULL"

%dw 2.0 output application/java --- ((vars.vrDetails filter (($.store_id as String == vars.storeId as String) and ($.delivery_partner_name as String== vars.deliveryPartner as String) and ($.brand_id as String == vars.brandId as String))).brand_name)[0] default ""

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- ((vars.vrDetails filter ( ($.store_id as String == vars.storeId as String) and ($.delivery_partner_name as String== vars.deliveryPartner as String) and ($.brand_id as String == vars.brandId as String) )).order_type_id)[0] default ""

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- ((vars.vrDetails filter ( ($.store_id as String == vars.storeId as String) and ($.delivery_partner_name as String== vars.deliveryPartner as String) and ($.brand_id as String == vars.brandId as String) )).employee_object_number)[0] default ""

set-variable.value: #[using(empObjNum = vars.tenderId.employeeObjectNum) if( empObjNum== "98008" and empObjNum == "96010" and empObjNum == "96011" and empObjNum == "96012") "Pickup" else "Delivery"]

when.expression: #[using(subject = vars.tenderId.messageSubject) subject != "Grub Hub Delivery" and subject != "Uber Eats Delivery" and subject != "Postmates Delivery" and subject != "Door Dash Delivery"]

db:select.doc:name: Select CartId
db:select.db:sql: SELECT distinct cart_id FROM [dbo].[validate_olo_duplicate_orders] with (Nolock) WHERE store_id = :storeId AND cart_id = :cartId AND day_of_business = :currentDate AND delivery_partner_name in ('OLO', 'PayInStore','Online Orders')

db:select.doc:name: Select Check Payload
db:select.db:sql: SELECT check_payload from [dbo].[olo_cart_id_details] with (Nolock) WHERE store_id =:storeId AND cart_id = :cartId

logger.doc:name: INFO: Success
logger.message: #[vars.storeId] - get duplicate olo payload from db Completed

set-variable.value: Following error occurred in Create Check method for Store #[vars.storeId] : #[error]

logger.message: Create Check Flow Completed with Errors

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { methodName: 'CreateCheck', storeId: if ( vars.storeId != null ) vars.storeId else vars.vrStoreId, checkNumber: 'Null', checkSequence: 'Null', employeeNumber: 'Null', tableNumber: 'Null', status: '0', message: error }]

logger.doc:name: INFO: Start
logger.message: Caluclate Tax And Total Flow Started

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { methodName: 'CalculateTaxAndTotal', storeId: if ( vars.storeId != null ) vars.storeId else vars.vrStoreId, checkNumber: 'Null', checkSequence: 'Null', employeeNumber: 'Null', tableNumber: 'Null', status: '1', message: vars.initialPayload }]

logger.doc:name: INFO: Failure
logger.message: Caluclate Tax And Total Flow flow completed unsuccessfully

set-variable.value: Following error occurred in CalculateTaxAndTotal method for Store #[vars.storeId] : #[error]

logger.message: Caluclate Tax And Total Flow Completed with Errors

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { methodName: 'CalculateTaxAndTotal', storeId: if ( vars.storeId != null ) vars.storeId else vars.vrStoreId, checkNumber: 'Null', checkSequence: 'Null', employeeNumber: 'Null', tableNumber: 'Null', status: '0', message: error }]

#[output application/json --- { methodName: 'CalculateTotals', storeId: if ( vars.storeId != null ) vars.storeId else vars.vrStoreId, checkNumber: 'Null', checkSequence: 'Null', employeeNumber: 'Null', tableNumber: 'Null', status: '1', message: vars.initialPayload }]

ee:variables.ee:set-variable: %dw 2.0 output application/json var fullfillmentType = "Delivery" fun getPaymentCardType(authSystem) = if ( authSystem == "amazon_rws" ) "RWS" else authSystem fun getEmployeeObjectNumber(cardType, fullfillmentType) = if ( cardType == "GH" and fullfillmentType == "pickup" ) "96013" else if ( cardType == "GH" ) "96002" else if ( cardType == "GB" ) "96008" else if ( cardType == "RWS" ) "96003" else if ( cardType == "UBE" and fullfillmentType == "pickup" ) "96012" else if ( cardType == "UBE" ) "96004" else if ( cardType == "PM" ) "96009" else if ( cardType == "DD" and fullfillmentType == "pickup" ) "96011" else if ( cardType == "DD" ) "96005" else "98008" fun getTenderMediaObjectNumberforMicros(cardType)= if ( ["GB", "GH","RWS","UBE","PM","DD"] contains cardType ) "12" else "58" fun getOrderTypeIDforMicros(cardType) = if ( ["GH","RWS","UBE","PM","DD"] contains cardType ) "4" else "5" fun getRevenueCenterObjectNumforMicros(cardType) = if ( ["GB", "GH","RWS","UBE","PM","DD"] contains cardType ) "6" else "5" --- { calcTotalsEmployeeObjectNum: getEmployeeObjectNumber(getPaymentCardType(vars.authSystem), fullfillmentType), calcTotalsTenderObjectNum: getTenderMediaObjectNumberforMicros(getPaymentCardType(vars.authSystem)), calcTotalsOrderTypeID: getOrderTypeIDforMicros(getPaymentCardType(vars.authSystem)), calcTotalsRevenueCenterObjectNumber: getRevenueCenterObjectNumforMicros(getPaymentCardType(vars.authSystem)) }
%dw 2.0 output application/json --- 'Store Number ' ++ vars.storeId ++ ' not setup in mulesoft for online ordering'

%dw 2.0 output application/json --- { methodName: 'CalculateTotals', storeId: if ( vars.storeId != null ) vars.storeId else vars.vrStoreId, checkNumber: 'Null', checkSequence: 'Null', employeeNumber: 'Null', tableNumber: 'Null', status: '0', message: "Store server not reachable, able to reach Firewall" }

set-variable.value: Following error occurred in CalculateTotals method for Store #[vars.storeId] : #[error]

logger.message: Caluclate Total Flow Completed with Errors

set-variable.value: #[output application/json --- { methodName: 'CalculateTotals', storeId: if ( vars.storeId != null ) vars.storeId else vars.vrStoreId, checkNumber: 'Null', checkSequence: 'Null', employeeNumber: 'Null', tableNumber: 'Null', status: '0', message: error }]
